name: SUPER EVIL ROBOT SHOOTER 2079
description:
A Single-Player Frenetic Fps

I suggest you not Stay sill  (｀▽´)

IN DEVELOPMENT
Last Update: 24/10/2020

Sill working on the boss battle ,levels , weapons , and some other features.

Controls :
W A S D - basic movements

left click - Shoot
right click - aim

R - Reload

T - Drop the Weapon

Space - jump

E - Interact / Get Weapon
